subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Terry was suspended for Game 6 by the N.B.A. for punching the Spurs' Michael Finley in the groin during a loose-ball scuffle in the final 3.4 seconds of San Antonio's 98-97 victory in Game 5.
snippet: Jason Terry was suspended for Game 6 by the N.B.A. for punching the Spurs' Michael Finley in the groin during a loose-ball scuffle in the final 3.4 seconds of San Antonio's 98-97 victory in Game 5.
